Package com.openclassrooms.tourguide.dto

Class AttractionNearUserDto

java.lang.Object
com.openclassrooms.tourguide.dto.AttractionNearUserDto
public class AttractionNearUserDto extends Object
A class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) AttractionNearUserDto. It contains getters and setters, as well as an override toSring() method for display in the console.
